Name: Make the extension of certain local emergency orders subject to the approval of the local governing (S.7545 /A.9342).
Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and Governor to sign, S.7545 /A.9342, to make the extension of certain local emergency orders subject to the approval of the local governing
BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
